sense.gloss: humanity and justice (esp. in Confucianism), virtue
formal greeting (between yakuza, street vendors, gamblers, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑泥棒↑↓どろぼう↓↑仲間↑↓なかま↓にも↑仁義↑↓|じんぎ|↓がある。
↑盗人↑↓ぬすっと↓にも↑仁義↑↓|じんぎ|↓。
sdata.e: There is honor even among thieves.

sdata.j: み|じん↑切↑↓ぎ|↓りとさいの↑目↑↓め↓↑切↑↓ぎ↓りって、↑何↑↓なに↓が↑違↑↓ちが↓うの？
sdata.e: What's the difference between chopped and diced?
